completed_tasks: Updated honeypot.target with essential services only
Fixed service dependencies to use Docker instead of systemd elasticsearch
Updated all service files to proper startup order
pending_tasks: Test system startup and verify all capabilities work
issues_found: Multiple duplicate services causing startup conflicts
Services trying to control already-running Docker containers
Data forwarder getting 429 rate limit errors
